title: Pixel 4a fingerprint scanner functionality disappeared?
content:
Yesterday the fingerprint scanner stopped responding to any touch (not vibrating when touched etc) , as if there was no sensor there at all.

At first I thought I might have broken the sensor somehow, but looking at the device settings I can see that Pixel Imprint, or any other options to use a fingerprint scanner for passcode lock etc are gone?

Been on Android 11 for a few weeks now but this has only started since yesterday. Anybody else experiencing this?

Will back it up and maybe give it a factory reset to see if it helps...
